Description: Sherd (base). With sub-Sultanabad ornament and inscription. Made of black painted and cobalt stained and green glazed pottery (buff).
Curator's comments: Cf. O. Watson, Ceramics from Islamic Lands (London 2004) cat. S.3.
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (pl.xxxix.c)
